bibl.note: This document is a letter written by John Sevier requesting forty dollars in payment for a house he built at Southwest Point. The letter was written to David Henley in 1797.

div1.p: If conveinant would be glad to receive the forty dollars I paid for building the home at S.W. Point. You are best acquainted with the form in which receipts ought to be drawn. Any one that you might think proper to send for the purpose will be agreable to me_

closer.salute:
I have the honor to be
With esteem & respect
your obet. servt.
